properties.name: bot.setting.ownerId
properties.description: Id of the discord bot owner

properties.name: bot.setting.persistence.user.thread-number
properties.description: Set the number of thread to use to persist users. A good setting avoid bot getting spam when discord servers are getting raid for example.

properties.name: bot.setting.persistence.role.thread-number
properties.description: Set the number of thread to use to persist roles.

properties.name: bot.setting.persistence.server.thread-number
properties.description: Set the number of thread to use to persist servers.

properties.name: bot.setting.persistence.persist-at-role-change
properties.description: If the member role as to be persisted at role change or if we persist it at member leave.

properties.name: bot.setting.persistence.reload-at-bot-reload
properties.description: Set if we need to re-persist / reload all servers at bot reload. Useful to get data missed during downtime.
